entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
